name: EXPLORING A HAUNTED UNDERGROUND HOSPITAL! Halloween Day Trip with Aurigny and Flybe
description:
I took a trip to the Channel Islands with Flybe and Aurigny to have a look around the haunted tunnels of an abandoned underground  hospital! Definitely one of the creepiest things I've ever done, but a great place to visit with some fascinating history.

FLIGHTS
1) Flybe ATR72-600 Southend to Manchester
2) Aurigny ATR72-500 Manchester to Guernsey
3) Flybe ATR72-500 Guernsey to Southampton
4) Flybe Bombardier DHC8-Q400 Southampton to Manchester

All of the above flights are available in full length at inflightvideo.tv.

BECOME A VIP: Exclusive videos, free gifts and a discount on our merch store: patreon.com/inflightvideo
